document_name: Decree No. 2016-0006 P-RM instituting the National Mechanism for Early Warning and Security Risk Response
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2016/MLI-2016-01-15-Decree No. 2016-0006 P-RM instituting the National Mechanism for Early Warning and Security Risk Response_5fb29229a85258b2678c871da16a3d8b.pdf
document_description: This decree establishes the National Early Warning and Security Risk Response Mechanism. The National Early Warning and Response Mechanism's mission is to collect information and data on threats, good governance, security and peace in Mali, to alert the Government, to suggest appropriate responses for the identified threats, to monitor and / or coordinate the implementation of the responses agreed to by the Government.
